notesStmt.note: Bagalāmukhīkavaca from the Ekavīrātantra. Title on cover folio is Bagalāstotra. Cover folio (written in another hand on paper not part of original ms.) reads: śrīḥ gajānanaḥ prasannostu. Bagalāstotram etat.

Poor condition. Leaves dark brown, stained, torn on edges and brittle. Three folios have been mended with white paper and written over in a different hand. Some text lost on right margins. Orange powder rubbed in over invocation, colophon, some words and most verse numbers. Marginal corrections.

Begins (f 1v): śrīgaṇādhipataye namaḥ. śrīmahālakṣmyai namaḥ. [ ]rubho namaḥ. śrīparadevatāya namaḥ. śrīr astuḥ śu[ ]. śrīmahogratārovāca. rājñāṁ maṇḍalagādīna[ ] parivisarpatāṁ sagarvāṇāṁ mahādeva dhanair vikṛtace[ ] (verse 1).
Ends (f. 5v): kṛtvā purā tu kavacaṁ japenmantraṁ samāhitaḥ naanyathāthā stambhinīvidyāsiddhā syād iti niścayaḥ (verse 43).
